definition.text: Your Superalgos SA Token rewards will go to the address you just generated, so you should safely store the private key that you will use to access the address.

paragraphs.text: Superalgos doesnâ€™t offer a built-in solution to securely back up your private keys. The system generates a BSC address / private key pair and delivers it in the configuration of the Profile Constructor. It is up to you to decide how you are going to handle this sensitive information.
Access the configuration of the Profile Constructor. Find the address and private key, and back up the information in whatever way you see fit.
